content: looking for a quick and easy crochet project that will keep you warm this season look no further this beginner-friendly tutorial will show you how to create a stylish and cozy wrap sweater scarf that s perfect for layering or dressing up with its simple pattern and soft inviting design this scarf is a must-have for any crocheter s wardrobe yarn bee - yarntopia - 4oz/113g - 312 yd/285 m - 100% acrylic - category 2 fine yarn - 6 7 8 skeins hook h 5 00mm size pattern sizes xs-m l-2x 3x-5x pattern is for three sizes that includes xs-5x wearer s bust measurement for each size is 28 - 38 40 - 50 52-62 inches scarf width 16 16 75 17 5 inches cuff to cuff length 106 112 5 125 5 inches sleeve length 14 5 15 5 16 inches body section length 78 5 81 92 5 inches
